text: "Arthur's Theme (Best That You Can Do)" is a 1981 song by Christopher Cross and is the theme song to the 1981 movie Arthur. It went to number 1 in the United States and Norway, number 7 in the United Kingdom, Ireland and South Africa, number 10 in New Zealand, number 2 in Canada, number 13 in Australia and number 5 in Italy. It won an Academy Award in 1982. == References == Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Christopher Cross songs
title: Arthur's Theme (Best That You Can Do)
